title: Page is up!
author: JGray
text: Sorry about that, folks. We ran a little behind schedule but the page is up and looking pretty. For commentary, see the next journal entry down.

replies.author: Katy*Guest*
replies.text: LOL "You hack like a blonde" - that's priceless!

replies.author: uhl*Guest*
replies.text: Rofl, maybe it's because she IS a blonde?

replies.author: weertangel*Guest*
replies.text: Uhl, i think she means"u hack like a DUMB blonde" , meaning without thinking...

replies.author: JGray
replies.text: In Theresa's mind, blonde isn't just a hair color. Its a state of mind... or lack of one. She says blonde the way some people say "girl" or "cheerleader".
